INSERT INTO basis_tb_trade ( TRADE_ID, TRADE_NO, USER_ID, SHOP_ID, TYPE, TRADE_PRICE, COUPON_PRICE, POSTAGE, `CHANGE`, TRADE_POINTS, SHIPMENT, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PROVINCE, RECEIVER_CITY, RECEIVER_AREA, RECEIVER_BACK_CODE, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, RECEIVER_ZIP, RECEIVER_TEL, CREATE_DATE, STATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #tradeId#, #tradeNo#, #userId#, #shopId#, #type#, #tradePrice#, #couponPrice#, #postage#, #change#, #tradePoints#, #shipment#, #receiverName#, #receiverProvince#, #receiverCity#, #receiverArea#, #receiverBackCode#, #receiverAddress#, #receiverZip#, #receiverTel#, NOW(), 'U', #userId#, NOW(), #userId# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM basis_tb_trade t WHERE t.STATE = 'U'

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.coupon_price AS couponPrice, t.postage, t.change, t.receiver_name AS receiverName, t.receiver_tel AS receiverTel, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modifyDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.send_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.sign_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS signDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedback_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedbacked_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackedDate, t.type, IFNULL(t.score, 0), t.trade_points AS tradePoints, t.shipment, t.feedback_type AS feedbackType FROM basis_tb_trade t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.user_id = #userId#
t.type IN #codes[]#
ORDER BY TRADE_ID DESC
ORDER BY $sort$ $order$, TRADE_ID DESC
LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $offset$

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.type, t.pay_type AS payType, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.coupon_price AS couponPrice, t.postage, t.change, t.receiver_name AS receiverName, t.receiver_province AS receiverProvince, t.receiver_city AS receiverCity, t.receiver_area AS receiverArea, t.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, t.receiver_tel AS receiverTel FROM basis_tb_trade t WHERE t.trade_no = #tradeNo#
t.user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE basis_tb_trade t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #modifyUser#
t.type = #type#
t.PAY_DATE = STR_TO_DATE( #payDate#, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
t.SEND_DATE = NOW()
t.SIGN_DATE = NOW()
t.FEEDBACK_DATE = NOW()
t.FEEDBACKED_DATE = NOW()
t.receiver_name = #receiverName#
t.receiver_province = #receiverProvince#
t.receiver_city = #receiverCity#
t.receiver_area = #receiverArea#
t.receiver_back_code = #receiverBackCode#
t.receiver_address = #receiverAddress#
t.receiver_zip = #receiverZip#
t.receiver_tel = #receiverTel#
t.shipment = #shipment#
t.pay_type = #payType#
t.feedback_type = #feedbackType#
t.score = #score#
WHERE t.state = 'U'
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.trade_no = #tradeNo#
t.user_id = #userId#
t.type <> #type#
